articles.title: Trump's travel ban is now in effect. Here's what to know - NPR
articles.summary: Trump's travel ban is now in effect. Here's what to know Travelers pass through Newark Liberty International Airport's international terminal after President Trump's new travel ban took effect on Monday. President Trump's extensive new travel ban took effect just after midnight on Monday, barring nationals of 12 countries from entering the U. S. and partially restricting those from another seven.
